description: portraits of two men; at center Claude La Favre wearing fur hat, cloak and white stock; at an angle lower right Mr. John Hayls wearing a jacket with large buttons and starched white collar
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black around center frame: [CLAUDE LA FEVRE];  in black around oval frame: {MR. JOHN HAYLS   Hoskins pinx.]; on sheet in pencil: [1-405]
title: Portraits of Claude La Fevre and Mr. John Hayls
